item.title: 3D Printing Podcast – How Affiliate Marketing Helps 3D Printing Firms
item.dc:creator: Bill Decker
item.description: What Is Affiliate Marketing? Affiliate marketing is a type of performance-based marketing in which a business rewards one or more affiliates for each visitor or customer brought by the affiliate’s own marketing efforts. The industry has four core players: the merchant (also known as ‘retailer’ or ‘brand’), the network (that [...] Read more »
item.content:encoded:
What Is Affiliate Marketing?

Affiliate marketing is a type of performance-based marketing in which a business rewards one or more affiliates for each visitor or customer brought by the affiliate’s own marketing efforts. The industry has four core players: the merchant (also known as ‘retailer’ or ‘brand’), the network (that contains offers for the affiliate to choose from and also takes care of the payments), the publisher (also known as ‘the affiliate’), and the customer. The market has grown in complexity, resulting in the emergence of a secondary tier of players, including affiliate management agencies, super-affiliates and specialized third party vendors.

 

Take a look at Amazon 3D Printers to see how the champion handles this.

Click in this link to  Email us

 

More on affiliate marketing can be found on one of our 3D Printing Sites

Affiliate marketing is a type of performance-based marketing in which a business rewards one or more affiliates for each visitor or customer brought by the affiliate’s own marketing efforts. The industry has four core players: the merchant (also known as ‘retailer’ or ‘brand’), the network (that contains offers for the affiliate to choose from and also takes care of the payments), the publisher (also known as ‘the affiliate’), and the customer. The market has grown in complexity, resulting in the emergence of a secondary tier of players, including affiliate management agencies, super-affiliates and specialized third party vendors.

item.title: 3D Printing Future – One Company Owner Predicts 3D Printing Ease
item.dc:creator: Bill Decker
item.description: What is the future of 3D Printing? Here a CEO of a 3D Printing firm speculates on where the industry is heading, and why it is becoming more and more user friendly.

item.dc:creator: Bill Decker
item.description: 3D Modeling Made easy? Buck at Clemons Coding thinks 3D Modeling will just keep getting easier and easier. Listen to this quick podcast and hear what an insider has to say. More on his firm at: http://www.thinkdrawprint.net

item.description: 3D Printing Radio News. The 3D Printing Voice interviews Buck Clemons at Clemons Coding. He talks about the open source community helping to define the product, the market, and the uses of his software! Reach their firm at: http://www.thinkdrawprint.net

item.title: 3D Printing Radio Interview – A 3D Printer That Uses Paper
item.dc:creator: Bill Decker
item.description: Our second interview with Dr. Conor MacCormack of Mcor technologies. Hear Conor explains the benefits of using paper instead of other substances when doing rapid prototyping. Listen to the quick podcast and hear it from the CEO.

item.title: 3D Printing Made From Paper – Podcast Interview With CEO
item.dc:creator: Bill Decker
item.description: Dr. Conor MacCormack of Mcor technologies builds 3D Printers that use paper! Low cost of use, greater ease of use! And no fumes from 3D Printing. Listen to the quick podcast and hear for yourself!
item.content:encoded:
Dr. Conor MacCormack of Mcor technologies builds 3D Printers that use paper! Low cost of use, greater ease of use! And no fumes from 3D Printing.

item.title: 3D Printing Funding- Podcast on Challenges in 3D Printing Industry
item.dc:creator: Bill Decker
item.description: 3D Printing Companies have special challenges when they look for funding. The 3D Printing Industry is new. It’s controversial. And the message needs to be simple. Listen to a professional fundraiser and hear her views.
